cgc_sync__Sync_Message__c.name: cgc_sync__Sync_Message__c
cgc_sync__Sync_Message__c.description: Represents the messages that are exposed to a mobile app user during the sync process

LastReferencedDate.description: Date when the record was last referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: Date when the record was last viewed.

cgc_sync__Category__c.description: Category of the sync message. Possible values are: Core sync message Static sync message Dynamic sync message

cgc_sync__IsCore__c.description: Defines whether the sync message is a core system message (true) or not (false).

cgc_sync__MappingType__c.description: Describes the mapping type of the sync message.
